========================================
DEPLOYMENT SUCCESSFUL!  
========================================
    
Next Steps:
1. SSH into Nginx server: ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 ec2-user@158.252.82.95
2. Edit Nginx config: sudo vim /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
3. Update backend IPs in upstream block:  
   - BACKEND_IP_1: 10.0.10.66
   - BACKEND_IP_2: 10.0.10.183
   - BACKEND_IP_3: 10.0.10.83
4. Restart Nginx: sudo systemctl restart nginx
5. Test: https://158.252.82.95
    
Backend Servers:
- web-1:  51.112.178.169 (private:  10.0.10.66)
    - web-2:  158.252.32.156 (private:  10.0.10.183)
    - web-3:  40.172.101.73 (private:  10.0.10.83)
